cigaretteLicenseStep1.content:
:::infoAlert 
 This application is only for a **Retail Over-the-Counter** Cigarette License. If you need a **Vending Machine** or **Manufacturer Representative** License, [download the paper application (PDF)](https://www.njportal.com/DOR/CM100/Content/pdfs/cm100CigApp.pdf) and follow the mailing instructions on the form.
:::

## About This License

**You need a Retail Over-the-Counter Cigarette License to sell cigarettes in New Jersey.**

If you sell container e-liquid and plan to have more than 50% of your retail sales come from electronic smoking devices, related accessories, and liquid nicotine, [apply for a Vapor Business License](https://www.nj.gov/treasury/taxation/pdf/other_forms/tobacco/vb-r.pdf).

- - -

## Application Requirements

### License Fee

* $50 per license

### Licensee Info

* Business name
* 12-digit `NJ Tax ID|tax-id` 
* Business address **(no P.O. boxes)**
* Mailing address
* Contact name
* Phone number
* Email address

### Sales Info

* Start date of cigarette sales
* Supplier name

### Additional Tax Requirements

For more information on taxes and other requirements, [visit the Cigarette Tax Page](https://www.nj.gov/treasury/taxation/cigarette.shtml).

- - -

:::largeCallout{ showHeader="false" headerText=""  calloutType="informational" amountIconText="" filingTypeIconText="" frequencyIconText="" phoneIconText="" emailIconText="" }

[Visit Tobacco-Free for a Healthy New Jersey](https://www.tobaccofreenj.com/stomp) to learn about the age of sale (21) and the proper way to check identification. 
:::

:::largeCallout{ showHeader="true" headerText="What if I don't get this license?" calloutType="warning" amountIconText="" filingTypeIconText="" frequencyIconText="" phoneIconText="" emailIconText="" }

You must have a license to sell cigarettes in New Jersey. If you sell cigarettes without a license, you may face fines and prison.

:::

:::largeCallout{ showHeader="true" headerText="Once completed you will have:"  calloutType="conditional" amountIconText="" filingTypeIconText="" frequencyIconText="" phoneIconText="" emailIconText="" }

A printed license, sent directly to your business location.

:::
